name: Pls Kill it.
description:
Thank you for downloading this game.

This is a first-person shooter game used to measure the player's own strength and how close the AI is to the player's technology. The AI enemies in the game will be familiar with the player's operations and try to defeat you in every battle. Players need to play their own roles The ultimate first-person shooter, defeat the enemy in front of you.
After completing the goals in the game, players can find their battle records and performance data from the game folder. Welcome to refer to these data to evaluate their own strength!!
For more details, wait for you to download and enter the game. The following are the basic operations of the game.

Move: [W, A, S, D] keyboard keys.
Perspective: [mouse].
Pause and set: 【ESC】
Switch magazine: [R]
Shoot/shoot: [left mouse button]
